+            leading: Icon(
+              Icons.screen_search_desktop_rounded,
+              color: Colors.black.withOpacity(0.5),
+            ),
+            onTap: () {
+              showGotoAlert(context);
+            },
+          ),
         ),
       ),
     );
   }
